thread.title: Ivanka Trump's fashion line is DUMPED by luxury department store Nordstrom after thousands of women boycott brand over the election
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump's fashion line is DUMPED by luxury department store Nordstrom after thousands of women boycott brand over the election

title: Ivanka Trump's fashion line is DUMPED by luxury department store Nordstrom after thousands of women boycott brand over the election
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments IVANKA Trump’s luxury fashion line has been axed by a top department store after calls for women to boycott products associated with the infamous family brand. 
Nordstrom said it will no longer carry stock brand items from the US President Donald Trump’s daughter because of declining sales. Getty Images Norstrom said the decision to axe the Ivanka Trump brand was based on its ‘performance this season’ shazad.ahmed@the-sun.co.uk It has reported that eight retailers have now dropped the Ivanka Trump brand in response to her father’s sex assault allegations shazad.ahmed@the-sun.co.uk The company has recently moved into baby bedding and fashion jewellery but make most of its cash from licensed clothing shazad.ahmed@the-sun.co.uk The Ivanka Trump brand makes the largest share of its revenue from licensed clothing Reuters Ivanka Trump, daughter of US President Donald Trump, appears to have suffered from a backlash against products associated with her father EPA The mother-of-three was a regular at the side of Donald during his successful campaign for the White House Getty Images - FilmMagic 11 Ivanka, 35, has set up her own business venture and forged a career as a model alongside appearing in the Apprentice series 
The announcement comes after several retailers stopped selling Ivanka’s merchandise due to the Grab Your Wallet campaign launched by Shannon Coutler. 
This was sparked by Trump’s infamous “grab them by the p***y” remark” from a leaked audio and sex assault allegations. 
It emerged Donald had once described Ivanka as “more voluptuous than ever” in a 2006 interview with shock jock DJ Howard Stern. 
Coulter told Bloomberg that she was “absolutely thrilled” after Nordstrom shelved the fashion label. “Each year we cut about 10% [of brands carried] and refresh our assortment with about the same amount,” a Nordstrom spokesperson told Business Insider . “In this case, based on the brand’s performance we’ve decided not to buy it for this season.” RELATED STORIES Spotlight on Ivanka Trump, Donald's older daughter and US businesswoman 'A COMPLETE DETACHMENT FROM REALITY' Ivanka Trump is slammed for posing in £4,000 dress as US airports are thrown into chaos over her dad’s Muslim travel ban TRUMP BEHIND BARS Ivanka Trump shares bedtime photo of son Theodore in his cot at the family's Washington DC home FAMILY AFFAIR Ivanka, Donald Jr. and Eric take to social media to share delight as Donald Trump becomes President 'I’ve just had enough' Woman who was stalked by the same man as Ivanka Trump discusses her horrific ordeal THE NEW FIRST FAMILY Meet the Trumps - Ivanka, Tiffany, Eric, Barron and Donald Jr - here's what we know Thank you @Nordstrom for dumping Ivanka Trump brand– now I can continue to shop in your store. #GrabYourWallet https://t.co/qsqmdmfsUn 
— Hayley Nelson (@hayley_nelson) February 3, 2017 Actually 8 companies on #GrabYourWallet boycott list have dropped Trump ties, but @Nordstrom def. the one we're most excited about so far! https://t.co/MmMhBsL0aq 
— Shannon Coulter (@shannoncoulter) February 3, 2017 
Yesterday Ivanka Trump, 35, was no longer listed on Nordstrom’s master list of brands available. 
An Ivanka Trump brand spokesperson declined to comment. 
Other companies who have dropped her brand due to the Grab Your Wallet campaign include Shoes.com and interior decor store Bellacor, reports Mail Online . 
Ivanka, a mother-of-three, is married to Jared Kushner who has become a senior advisor and crucial figure in her father’s new administration. 
Ivanka, a former executive vice-president of the Trump organisation, licenses her name to partners who manufacture her various branded products. 
Her brand makes the largest share of its revenue from licensed clothing, but the company has recently moved into baby bedding and fashion jewellery. WWW.LMKMEDIA.COM Father and daughter Donald and Ivanka Trump pictured at a bash in 2008 Getty Images US First Lady Melania Trump speaking with Ivanka during the presidential inaugural parade Reuters Ivanka Trump and husband Jared Kushner arrive at the inauguration ceremonies, as her father Donald Trump is sworn in as the 45th US president Reuters
